mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_REGISTRATION (dr_idx, d_idx, d_date, d_commute, d_startTime, d_endTime, d_startPoint, d_endPoint, d_fee, d_distance, d_time,d_startlon, d_startlat, d_endlon, d_endlat) VALUES(DR_IDX_SEQ.nextval, #{dRegistration.dIdx}, #{convertDDate}, #{dRegistration.dCommute}, #{dRegistration.dStartTime}, #{dRegistration.dEndTime}, #{dRegistration.dStartPoint}, #{dRegistration.dEndPoint}, #{dRegistration.dFee}, #{dRegistration.dDistance}, #{dRegistration.dTime}, #{dRegistration.dStartlon}, #{dRegistration.dStartlat}, #{dRegistration.dEndlon}, #{dRegistration.dEndlat})
